advisories.name: RLSA-2022:5468
advisories.synopsis: Important: php:8.0 security update
advisories.topic:
An update for the php:8.0 module is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
advisories.description:
PHP is an HTML-embedded scripting language commonly used with the Apache HTTP Server.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

This update upgrades Thunderbird to version 91.11.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

advisories.synopsis: Important: firefox security update
advisories.topic:
An update for firefox is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
advisories.description:
Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser, designed for standards compliance, performance, and portability.
This update upgrades Firefox to version 91.11 ESR.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5339
advisories.synopsis: cloud-init bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for cloud-init is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The cloud-init packages provide a set of init scripts for cloud instances. Cloud instances need special scripts to run during initialization to retrieve and install SSH keys, and to let the user run various scripts.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5336
advisories.synopsis: xorg-x11-server and related packages bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for xorg-x11-server, xorg-x11-server-Xwayland, and xorg-x11-xtrans-devel is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description:
Xorg is an open-source implementation of the X Window System. It provides the basic low-level functionality that full-fledged graphical user interfaces are designed upon.
The xorg-x11-server-Xwayland is an X server for running X clients under Wayland.
The xorg-x11-xtrans-devel package is a development library used in Xorg and Xwayland to communicate with X clients.

advisories.name: RLEA-2022:5335
advisories.synopsis: papi bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for papi is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: PAPI (Performance Application Programming Interface) is a software library that provides a specification of cross-platform interfaces to hardware performance counters on modern microprocessors. These counters exist as a small set of registers that count events, which are occurrences of specific signals related to a processor's function. Monitoring these events allows developers to track performance-related events, such as cache misses, instructions retired, and clock cycles, to better understand the performance issues of the software. PAPI uses libpfm to select the performance monitoring events for the various processors.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5334
advisories.synopsis: evolution-ews bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for evolution-ews is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The evolution-ews package allows Evolution to interact with Microsoft Exchange servers, versions 2007 and later, through the Exchange Web Services (EWS) interface.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5333
advisories.synopsis: gdm bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for gdm is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description:
The GNOME Display Manager (GDM) provides the graphical login screen. The
screen is shown shortly after boot, after log out, and when switching the
current user.
(BZ#2085391)

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5332
advisories.synopsis: scap-security-guide bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for scap-security-guide is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The scap-security-guide project provides a guide for configuration of the system from the final system's security point of view. The guidance is specified in the Security Content Automation Protocol (SCAP) format and constitutes a catalog of practical hardening advice, linked to government requirements where applicable. The project bridges the gap between generalized policy requirements and specific implementation guidelines.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5330
advisories.synopsis: fence-agents bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for fence-agents is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The fence-agents packages provide a collection of scripts for handling remote power management for cluster devices. They allow failed or unreachable nodes to be forcibly restarted and removed from the cluster.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5329
advisories.synopsis: cheese bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for cheese is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: Cheese is an application for taking pictures and videos from a webcam. It can apply graphical effects.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5328
advisories.synopsis: nmstate bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for nmstate is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description:
Nmstate is a library with an accompanying command line tool that manages host
networking settings in a declarative manner and aimed to satisfy enterprise
needs to manage host networking through a northbound declarative API and multi
provider support on the southbound.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5327
advisories.synopsis: evolution-data-server bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for evolution-data-server is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The evolution-data-server packages provide a unified back end for applications which interact with contacts, tasks and calendar information. Evolution Data Server was originally developed as a back end for the Evolution information management application, but is now used by various other applications.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5325
advisories.synopsis: postgresql-odbc bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for postgresql-odbc is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The postgresql-odbc package includes the driver needed for applications to access a PostgreSQL system via ODBC (Open Database Connectivity).

advisories.name: RLEA-2022:5324
advisories.synopsis: pacemaker enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for pacemaker is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description:
The Pacemaker cluster resource manager is a collection of technologies
working together to maintain data integrity and application availability in
the event of failures.
The new feature should not be configured until all nodes in the cluster are running a pacemaker version that supports it. Users who do not intend to use the new feature do not need to apply the update.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5323
advisories.synopsis: alsa-sof-firmware bug fix update
advisories.topic: An udpate for alsa-sof-firmware is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The alsa-sof-firmware package contains the firmware binaries for the Sound Open Firmware project.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5322
advisories.synopsis: mtools bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for mtools is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: Mtools is a collection of utilities for files created in the MS-DOS operating system. Mtools allow you to read, write, and move MS-DOS file system files (normally on MS-DOS floppy disks). Mtools supports Windows95 style long file names, IBM extended density format (OS/2 XDF) disks, and disks formatted in the 2M program. Install Mtools if your scenario requires using MS-DOS disks.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5321
advisories.synopsis: sssd bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for sssd is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The System Security Services Daemon (SSSD) service provides a set of daemons to manage access to remote directories and authentication mechanisms. It also provides the Name Service Switch (NSS) and the Pluggable Authentication Modules (PAM) interfaces toward the system, and a pluggable back-end system to connect to multiple different account sources.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5320
advisories.synopsis: NetworkManager bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for NetworkManager is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: NetworkManager is a system network service that manages network devices and connections, attempting to keep active network connectivity when available. Its capabilities include managing Ethernet, wireless, mobile broadband (WWAN), and PPPoE devices, as well as providing VPN integration with a variety of different VPN services.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5315
advisories.synopsis: samba bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for samba is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: Samba is an open-source implementation of the Server Message Block (SMB) protocol and the related Common Internet File System (CIFS) protocol, which allow PC-compatible machines to share files, printers, and various information.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5312
advisories.synopsis: gcc bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for gcc is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The gcc packages provide compilers for C, C++, Java, Fortran, Objective C, and Ada 95 GNU, as well as related support libraries.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5310
advisories.synopsis: opencryptoki bug fixand enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for opencryptoki is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The opencryptoki packages contain version 3.0 of the PKCS#11 API, implemented for IBM Cryptocards, such as IBM 4764 and 4765 crypto cards. These packages include support for the IBM 4758 Cryptographic CoProcessor (with the PKCS#11 firmware loaded), the IBM eServer Cryptographic Accelerator (FC 4960 on IBM eServer System p), the IBM Crypto Express2 (FC 0863 or FC 0870 on IBM System z), and the IBM CP Assist for Cryptographic Function (FC 3863 on IBM System z). The opencryptoki packages also bring a software token implementation that can be used without any cryptographic hardware. These packages contain the Slot Daemon (pkcsslotd) and general utilities.

advisories.name: RLSA-2022:5337
advisories.synopsis: Moderate: go-toolset:rhel8 security and bug fix update
advisories.topic:
An update for the go-toolset:rhel8 module is now available for Rocky Linux 8.

Go Toolset provides the Go programming language tools and libraries. Go is alternatively known as golang.

advisories.synopsis: Low: compat-openssl10 security update
advisories.topic:
An update for compat-openssl10 is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Low. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
advisories.description:
OpenSSL is a toolkit that implements the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) and Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols, as well as a full-strength general-purpose cryptography library. compat-openssl10 provides the legacy 1.0 version of OpenSSL for use with older binaries.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5342
advisories.synopsis: pulseaudio bug fix update
advisories.topic: An update for pulseaudion is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: PulseAudio is a sound server for Linux, UNIX, and similar operating systems.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5341
advisories.synopsis: mutter bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for mutter is now available for Rocky Linux 8 Extended Update Support.
advisories.description:
Mutter is a compositing window manager that displays and manages desktop
through OpenGL. It combines the window-management logic inherited from the
Metacity window manager with a display engine that uses the Clutter
toolkit.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5340
advisories.synopsis: llvm-toolset:rhel8 bug fix update
advisories.topic: An update for the llvm-toolset:rhel8 module is now available for Rocky Enterprise Software FoundationEnterprise Linux 8.
advisories.description:
LLVM Toolset provides the LLVM compiler infrastructure framework, the Clang
compiler for the C and C++ languages, the LLDB debugger, and related tools for
code analysis.
Bug Fixes:

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5318
advisories.synopsis: dracut bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for dracut is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The dracut packages contain an event-driven initial RAM file system (initramfs) generator infrastructure based on the udev device manager. The virtual file system, initramfs, is loaded together with the kernel at boot time and initializes the system, so it can read and boot from the root partition.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5285
advisories.synopsis: gnome-initial-setup bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for gnome-initial-setup is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The gnome-initial-setup packages provide the Initial Setup application for GNOME, which allows for quick configuration of the operating system after installation.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5274
advisories.synopsis: gnome-control-center bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for gnome-control-center is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The gnome-control-center package contains configuration utilities for the GNOME desktop, which allow to configure accessibility options, desktop fonts, keyboard and mouse properties, sound setup, desktop theme and background, user interface properties, screen resolution, and other settings.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5380
advisories.synopsis: libtimezonemap bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for libtimezonemap is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The libtimezonemap packages contain a time zone map widget for the GTK+ toolkit. The widget displays a world map with a highlighted region representing the selected time zone, and the location can be changed by clicking the map.

advisories.name: RLEA-2022:5139
advisories.synopsis: nodejs:12 bug fix and enhancement update
advisories.topic: An update for the nodejs:12 module is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description:
Node.js is a software development platform for building fast and scalable
network applications in the JavaScript programming language.

advisories.name: RLSA-2022:5095
advisories.synopsis: Important: grub2, mokutil, shim, and shim-unsigned-x64 security update
advisories.topic:
An update for grub2, mokutil, shim, and shim-unsigned-x64 is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
advisories.description:
The grub2 packages provide version 2 of the Grand Unified Boot Loader (GRUB), a highly configurable and customizable boot loader with modular architecture. The packages support a variety of kernel formats, file systems, computer architectures, and hardware devices.
The shim package contains a first-stage UEFI boot loader that handles chaining to a trusted full boot loader under secure boot environments.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

advisories.name: RLBA-2022:5081
advisories.synopsis: glibc bug fix update
advisories.topic: An update for glibc is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisories.description: The glibc packages provide the standard C libraries (libc), POSIX thread libraries (libpthread), standard math libraries (libm), and the name service cache daemon (nscd) used by multiple programs on the system. Without these libraries, the Linux system cannot function correctly.

Mozilla Thunderbird is a standalone mail and newsgroup client.
This update upgrades Thunderbird to version 91.10.0.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
